description: A night-time curfew already affecting nine cities will now cover two-thirds of France.
title: Coronavirus: France puts 46 million under night curfew
title_page: Coronavirus: France puts 46 million under night curfew - BBC News

Source: Johns Hopkins University, national public health agencies and UN population data
